utils Package¶

utils Package¶

type_check Module¶

visuino.utils.type_check.getv_kw(kwargs, key, default, expected_types)¶

Get an valid keyword argument by doing type checking. Raises type error if any problems.

Kwargs :dict from kewyord arguments.
Key :any valid dict key.
Default :value to assume if key is not found.
Expected_types :
 single or tuple of types or classes (for use in isinstance() built-in).
